description: Apply the service update. For more information on service updates and applying them, see Applying Service Updates.

parameters.name: ServiceUpdateName
parameters.description: The unique ID of the service update.

nested_items.name: ProcessedUpdateActions
nested_items.description: Update actions that have been processed successfully.

nested_items.name: ReplicationGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the replication group.

nested_items.name: CacheClusterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the cache cluster.

nested_items.name: ServiceUpdateName
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the service update.

nested_items.name: UpdateActionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the update action on the Valkey or Redis OSS cluster.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedUpdateActions
nested_items.description: Update actions that haven't been processed successfully.

nested_items.name: CacheClusterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the cache cluster.

nested_items.name: ServiceUpdateName
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the service update.

nested_items.name: ErrorType
nested_items.description: The error type for requests that are not processed.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message that describes the reason the request was not processed.
